articles.title: How to send ‘WhatsApp-like’ disappearing messages on Instagram, Messenger - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Disappearing messages on Instagram are sent via Vanish Mode. Wonder how they are different from disappearing messages on WhatsApp? Here’s this and how to send the same
articles.content: Both do the same thing, however, in Vanish Mode messages disappear instantaneously whereas, in WhatsApp Disappearing mode, messages remain in the chat for 7 days.
